title: Automagic IO crash that doesn't lead to a failure
body:
#### What is the problem?

From https://travis-ci.org/datalad/datalad/jobs/333356795

Looks like an infinite loop that is somehow caught and does not leed to a test failure.

```
datalad.interface.tests.test_utils.test_result_filter ... ok
                                                                                ok
                                                                                Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/python/2.7.14/lib/python2.7/logging/handlers.py", line 78, in emit
    logging.FileHandler.emit(self, record)
  File "/opt/python/2.7.14/lib/python2.7/logging/__init__.py", line 957, in emit
    StreamHandler.emit(self, record)

    return fmt.format(record)

    record.msg = self._tb() + "  " + record.msg
```
